title: Add helper methods for workflow state
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] IsAwaitingHuman() returns true when Awaiting is set
- [ ] IsAwaitingHuman() returns true when Manual is true (backwards compat)
- [ ] GetAwaitingType() returns Awaiting value if set
- [ ] GetAwaitingType() returns "work" if Manual is true and Awaiting is null
- [ ] HasRequiredGate() returns true when Requires is set
- [ ] IsTerminalAwaiting() correctly identifies terminal vs non-terminal states
closed_reason: Added 4 workflow helper methods to Tick struct: IsAwaitingHuman() checks Awaiting or Manual flag, GetAwaitingType() returns awaiting type with backwards compat for Manual, HasRequiredGate() checks Requires field, IsTerminalAwaiting() identifies terminal states (approval/review/content/work). Tests added for all methods.
